name: Kung Fu School
description:
Welcome to the world of martial arts!

The game Kung Fu School is a simulator in which you learn to fight using unusual tactics. Your mission is to knock down as many enemies as possible using your hands and feet wisely in order not to lose energy but also to perform critical hits.

This is not the place where you will learn to write grammatically correctly, but instead you will know how to do a correct self-defense. Not everyone is destined for this, you have to be patient for daily and long-term training for a beautiful result. Do you think you can compete with the Panda bear?

Game Features :
- Multiple enemies at once
- Critical Kicks
- Correct attire
- Score
